languages.text: "Много грязных дел я совершил, много страшного видел. И, представляете, искренне уверовал. Что не смогли мои наставники, с тем справились смертные бои и мои товарищи, еженощно исповедовавшися в своих мерзостях. Кому им еще было исповедаться? Я хоть молитву знал. Так я стал корабельным священником, а затем и вовсе оставил преступный путь. Умер как пират, воскрес как миссионер — как заповедал святой Друз, усопший, но возрожденный Императором".

traits.locale_text: "Много грязных дел я совершил, много страшного видел. И, представляете, искренне уверовал. Что не смогли мои наставники, с тем справились смертные бои и мои товарищи, еженощно исповедовавшися в своих мерзостях. Кому им еще было исповедаться? Я хоть молитву знал. Так я стал корабельным священником, а затем и вовсе оставил преступный путь. Умер как пират, воскрес как миссионер — как заповедал святой Друз, усопший, но возрожденный Императором".

languages.text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Много грязных дел я совершил, много страшного видел. И, представляете, искренне уверовал. languages.text: “我干过很多肮脏的事情，也见过很多令人不安的事情。可即便如此，我还是成为了一名虔诚的信徒，说来真是挺难以置信的。我的导师没能劝我走上正路，可那些残酷的战斗，还有我的战友每晚痛苦的忏悔，让我踏上了这样的道路。如果我不帮他们，他们还能向谁忏悔呢？再怎么说，我也知道祈祷词怎么说。于是我就成了那艘船上的牧师，再后来，我彻底放弃了我的犯罪道路。身为海盗的我死了，身为传教士的我重生了。这就是圣德鲁苏斯为我指明的道路。他自己也曾死过一次，后来被帝皇复活了。”
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “我干过很多肮脏的事情，也见过很多令人不安的事情。可即便如此，我还是成为了一名虔诚的信徒，说来真是挺难以置信的。我的导师没能劝我走上正路，可那些残酷的战斗，还有我的战友每晚痛苦的忏悔，让我踏上了这样的道路。如果我不帮他们，他们还能向谁忏悔呢？再怎么说，我也知道祈祷词怎么说。于是我就成了那艘船上的牧师，再后来，我彻底放弃了我的犯罪道路。身为海盗的我死了，身为传教士的我重生了。这就是圣德鲁苏斯为我指明的道路。他自己也曾死过一次，后来被帝皇复活了。”

languages.text: 「私は様々な悪行を働いてきて、見たくない物も沢山見てきました。なのに、誠実な信者になったーーおかしいでしょう。命がけの戦いをし、仲間たちの毎晩の残虐行為の告白を聞くことは、私のメンターにも出来ない事だった。ですが、仲間だって他に告白する相手がいないでしょう？私は祈りの言葉を知っていた訳ですし。それで、私が船の教戒官になったんです。その時、犯罪行為は止めました。海賊としては死に、宣教師として生まれ変わったんです。そこで、聖ドルススを指揮しました。彼自身は亡くなった後、皇帝に復活させられました」
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「私は様々な悪行を働いてきて、見たくない物も沢山見てきました。なのに、誠実な信者になったーーおかしいでしょう。命がけの戦いをし、仲間たちの毎晩の残虐行為の告白を聞くことは、私のメンターにも出来ない事だった。ですが、仲間だって他に告白する相手がいないでしょう？私は祈りの言葉を知っていた訳ですし。それで、私が船の教戒官になったんです。その時、犯罪行為は止めました。海賊としては死に、宣教師として生まれ変わったんです。そこで、聖ドルススを指揮しました。彼自身は亡くなった後、皇帝に復活させられました」

languages.text: «He hecho muchas cosas impuras y visto muchas cosas inquietantes. Me he convertido en todo un creyente, fíjese. Las batallas mortales y las confesiones nocturnas de mis camaradas sobre sus atrocidades consiguieron lo que mis mentores no pudieron. ¿A quién más podían confesarse? Al menos yo estaba familiarizado con la oración. Así fue como me convertí en el Capellán de la nave. Fue entonces cuando renuncié por completo a mis actividades criminales. Morí como pirata y resucité como misionero, así lo ordenó san Drusus, quien a su vez había fallecido y fue resucitado por el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «He hecho muchas cosas impuras y visto muchas cosas inquietantes. Me he convertido en todo un creyente, fíjese. Las batallas mortales y las confesiones nocturnas de mis camaradas sobre sus atrocidades consiguieron lo que mis mentores no pudieron. ¿A quién más podían confesarse? Al menos yo estaba familiarizado con la oración. Así fue como me convertí en el Capellán de la nave. Fue entonces cuando renuncié por completo a mis actividades criminales. Morí como pirata y resucité como misionero, así lo ordenó san Drusus, quien a su vez había fallecido y fue resucitado por el Emperador».

languages.text: "Ich habe viele unreine Taten und viele verstörende Dinge gesehen. Und ich bin ein aufrichtig Glaubender geworden, stellt Euch das vor. Tödliche Kämpfe und die nächtlichen Beichten meiner Kameraden, in denen sie Gräueltaten ihre gestehen, haben erreicht, was meine Mentoren nie erreichen konnten. Bei wem sonst hätten sie beichten sollen? Ich kannte zumindest die Worte des Gebets, wenn auch nicht viel mehr. So wurde ich zum Ordenspriester des Schiffs. Dann habe ich dem Verbrecherleben völlig abgeschworen. Ich bin als Pirat gestorben und wurde als Missionar wiedergeboren. Das war der Befehl des Heiligen Drusus, der selbst gestorben ist und durch die Gnade des Imperators wiederauferstanden."
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe viele unreine Taten und viele verstörende Dinge gesehen. Und ich bin ein aufrichtig Glaubender geworden, stellt Euch das vor. Tödliche Kämpfe und die nächtlichen Beichten meiner Kameraden, in denen sie Gräueltaten ihre gestehen, haben erreicht, was meine Mentoren nie erreichen konnten. Bei wem sonst hätten sie beichten sollen? Ich kannte zumindest die Worte des Gebets, wenn auch nicht viel mehr. So wurde ich zum Ordenspriester des Schiffs. Dann habe ich dem Verbrecherleben völlig abgeschworen. Ich bin als Pirat gestorben und wurde als Missionar wiedergeboren. Das war der Befehl des Heiligen Drusus, der selbst gestorben ist und durch die Gnade des Imperators wiederauferstanden."

languages.text: « J'ai commis bien des péchés et vu bien des horreurs. Croyez-le ou non, mais c'est ce qui a fait de moi un véritable croyant. Participer à des combats sanglants et entendre les confessions nocturnes de mes camarades ont réussi là où mes mentors avaient échoué. Après tout, à qui d'autre pouvaient-ils confier leurs atrocités ? À défaut d'autre chose, j'étais au moins capable de réciter les prières. C'est comme ça que je suis devenu le chapelain du vaisseau et que j'ai fini par renoncer à cette vie de crime. Le pirate en moi est mort pour laisser place à un missionnaire, comme l'avait ordonné Saint Drusus, qui avait lui-même été ressuscité par l'Empereur après sa mort. »
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. That was how I became the ship's chaplain. Then I renounced my criminal ways altogether. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."

Le pirate en moi est mort pour laisser place à un missionnaire, comme l'avait ordonné Saint Drusus, qui avait lui-même été ressuscité par l'Empereur après sa mort. »

languages.text: "Sayısız kirli iş, vicdanımı rahatsız eden sayısız şey yaptım. Ve zaman içinde, içten bir şekilde inanmaya başladım, düşünebiliyor musunuz? Yönderlerimin yapamadığı şeyi bana, ölümcül muharebeler ve geceleri yoldaşlarımın günah çıkarmaları yaptı. Günah çıkarmak için başka kime gideceklerdi ki? Ben en azından duaları biliyordum. Bu şekilde geminin günah çıkaranı oldum. Ardından suç hayatımı tamamen arkamda bıraktım. Korsan hâlim öldü ve bir misyoner olarak yeniden doğdum: Ölen ve İmparator tarafından diriltilen Aziz Drusus'un emri böyledir."
languages.original_text: "I have done many unclean deeds and seen many unsettling things. And I have become a sincere believer — imagine that. Deadly battles and my comrades' nightly confessions of their atrocities did for me what my mentors couldn't. Who else could they confess to? I knew the words of the prayer, if nothing else. I died as a pirate and was reborn as a missionary: thus commanded Saint Drusus, who himself passed away and was resurrected by the Emperor."
